sen.j: 櫻間 弓川（さくらま きゅうせん、1889年（明治22年）5月18日 - 1957年（昭和32年）3月1日）は、シテ方金春流能楽師。
sen.e: Kyusen SAKURAMA (May 18, 1889 - March 1, 1957) was a Noh actor of the Konparu school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Kyusen SAKURAMA (May 18, 1889 - March 1, 1957) was a Noh actor of the Konparu school of shite-kata (lead actors).

His real name was Kintaro SAKURAMA.

He was the second son of Banma SAKURAMA.

sen.j: 大正・昭和を代表する金春流の能楽師。
sen.e: He was a leading Noh actor of the Konparu school in the Taisho and Showa periods.
He was a leading Noh actor of the Konparu school in the Taisho and Showa periods.
